entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 3:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
